user_query: I'm planning a surprise birthday party for my best friend and we need some entertainment. Can you provide me with the latest flight results from Aviator at Vai de Bob and Aposta Ganha? Also, generate some Sudoku puzzles for the party.

TaskList.description: Fetch the latest flight results from Aviator for Vai de Bob and Aposta Ganha.
Generate Sudoku puzzles for the party entertainment.
